argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_is2ndc | |- ( J e. 2ndc <-> E. x e. TopBases ( x ~<_ _om /\ ( topGen ` x ) = J ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_simplr | |- ( ( ( A e. V /\ x e. TopBases ) /\ x ~<_ _om ) -> x e. TopBases ) |
| 3 |  | #P_simpll | |- ( ( ( A e. V /\ x e. TopBases ) /\ x ~<_ _om ) -> A e. V ) |
| 4 |  | #P_tgrest | |- ( ( x e. TopBases /\ A e. V ) -> ( topGen ` ( x |`t A ) ) = ( ( topGen ` x ) |`t A ) ) |
| 5 | 2, 3, 4 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( ( A e. V /\ x e. TopBases ) /\ x ~<_ _om ) -> ( topGen ` ( x |`t A ) ) = ( ( topGen ` x ) |`t A ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_restbas | |- ( x e. TopBases -> ( x |`t A ) e. TopBases ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_ad2antlr | |- ( ( ( A e. V /\ x e. TopBases ) /\ x ~<_ _om ) -> ( x |`t A ) e. TopBases ) |
| 8 |  | #P_restval | |- ( ( x e. TopBases /\ A e. V ) -> ( x |`t A ) = ran ( y e. x |-> ( y i^i A ) ) ) |
| 9 | 2, 3, 8 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( ( A e. V /\ x e. TopBases ) /\ x ~<_ _om ) -> ( x |`t A ) = ran ( y e. x |-> ( y i^i A ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_1stcrestlem | |- ( x ~<_ _om -> ran ( y e. x |-> ( y i^i A ) ) ~<_ _om ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ( A e. V /\ x e. TopBases ) /\ x ~<_ _om ) -> ran ( y e. x |-> ( y i^i A ) ) ~<_ _om ) |
| 12 | 9, 11 | #P_eqbrtrd | |- ( ( ( A e. V /\ x e. TopBases ) /\ x ~<_ _om ) -> ( x |`t A ) ~<_ _om ) |
| 13 |  | #P_2ndci | |- ( ( ( x |`t A ) e. TopBases /\ ( x |`t A ) ~<_ _om ) -> ( topGen ` ( x |`t A ) ) e. 2ndc ) |
| 14 | 7, 12, 13 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( ( A e. V /\ x e. TopBases ) /\ x ~<_ _om ) -> ( topGen ` ( x |`t A ) ) e. 2ndc ) |
| 15 | 5, 14 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( ( ( A e. V /\ x e. TopBases ) /\ x ~<_ _om ) -> ( ( topGen ` x ) |`t A ) e. 2ndc ) |
| 16 |  | #P_oveq1 | |- ( ( topGen ` x ) = J -> ( ( topGen ` x ) |`t A ) = ( J |`t A ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( ( topGen ` x ) = J -> ( ( ( topGen ` x ) |`t A ) e. 2ndc <-> ( J |`t A ) e. 2ndc ) ) |
| 18 | 15, 17 | #P_syl5ibcom | |- ( ( ( A e. V /\ x e. TopBases ) /\ x ~<_ _om ) -> ( ( topGen ` x ) = J -> ( J |`t A ) e. 2ndc ) ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_expimpd | |- ( ( A e. V /\ x e. TopBases ) -> ( ( x ~<_ _om /\ ( topGen ` x ) = J ) -> ( J |`t A ) e. 2ndc ) ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_rexlimdva | |- ( A e. V -> ( E. x e. TopBases ( x ~<_ _om /\ ( topGen ` x ) = J ) -> ( J |`t A ) e. 2ndc ) ) |
| 21 | 1, 20 | #P_syl5bi | |- ( A e. V -> ( J e. 2ndc -> ( J |`t A ) e. 2ndc ) ) |
| 22 | 21 | #P_impcom | |- ( ( J e. 2ndc /\ A e. V ) -> ( J |`t A ) e. 2ndc ) |
